nodes.text: The temple on Batuu was a remote research facility operated by the Jedi Order on the planet Batuu, not far from where Black Spire Outpost was located. The isolated outpost was used by Jedi to study dark artifacts. During the High Republic Era, the Padawan Ady Sun'Zee studied in the temple with her master Sylwin when an incident occurred. The dark relic known as the Ancient Sith Runestone corrupted the Jedi and forced them to kill one another with only Sun'Zee surviving.
